resources.string: Your team is sitting in cloaked airplane heading through AlgiersÂ´ airspace towards the airdrop location. You are just receiving notification from your pilot through com, that ETA is approximately in five minutes, when the plane starts to shake. As you look outside the window, you can see the right wing of your plane falling down after being hit by antiaircraft gun and you quickly realise, that your plane is about to follow soon. Without a moment of hesitation you all grab your parachutes and start to jump out of the burning plane. A few seconds after the plane gets hit for the second time and it explodes. What are you going to do?
Wait with opening the parachutes for the last moment and risk crash
Open parachutes immediately and risk open fire

You are falling straight down and open your parachutes at the last possible moment. The landing was rough indeed, but this maneuver saved you from rain of bullets. Still, you need to get to the gear, which is stored in a guarded warehouse nearby. How will you approach the warehouse?
Go to warehouse right away to avoid being spotted by patrols
Try to think about strategy before approaching to avoid potential ambush

You have opened your parachutes right away, which resolves into wild gunfire in your direction. The bullet storm is tearing everything in its way, but all of you were able to make, though some of you are lightly wounded. To make things worse, the enemy was most likely able to determine your current location. Nevertheless, you still need to recover gear, which is stored in a guarded warehouse nearby. How will you approach the warehouse?
Go to warehouse right away to avoid being spotted by patrols
Try to think about strategy before approaching to avoid potential ambush

Once you all get rid of parachutes, you start to run towards the warehouse. Deciding scouting ahead would be waste of time you run over the first dune to find yourself facing two machine gun nests. You manage to disable them and approach the warehouse, but this recklessness cost you few gunshot wounds and a whole lot of ammo. Now you need to infiltrate the heavily guarded warehouse to obtain your gear.

You send out two members of your team to scout your surroundings, while you are trying to come up with strategy. After a while the scouts return reporting two machine gun nests just over the nearest dune. With the moment of surprise on your side, you have no problem taking care of them and approaching the warehouse. Now you need to infiltrate the heavily guarded warehouse to obtain your gear.

Once you all get rid of parachutes, you start to run towards the warehouse. On your way you find two abandoned machine gun nests. Luckily for you, the soldiers operating them are away, most likely looking for you. Thanks to this fortunate event, you have no problem approaching the warehouse. Now you need to infiltrate the heavily guarded warehouse to obtain your gear.

You sit down trying to determine the best possible strategy and to patch up the gunshot wounds, when suddenly the sands starts popping few meters from you. The enemy patrol is coming behind the nearest dune and is already reloading. You make your escape using three smoke grenades, but still end up getting hit few times during the pursuit. After a while you are able to shake off your pursuers and reach the warehouse. Now you need to infiltrate this heavily guarded warehouse to obtain your gear.
It is time to call the professionals - poacher %2$d, it\'s your time!
